params:
import jp.ac.kyoto_u.i.soc.ai.iostbase.event.TimerEvent;
import jp.ac.kyoto_u.i.soc.ai.iostbase.service.intf.Event;
import jp.ac.kyoto_u.i.soc.ai.iostbase.EventStore;

global EventStore eventStore;

rule "rule1"
when
  $time: TimerEvent()
  $req:Event(deviceId.contains("request:comfortability") && ($time.getTime() - created.getTime()) <  10 * 1000)
  $temp:Event(dataType == "temperature" && placeTag == $req.getPlaceTag())  
  $humid:Event(dataType == "humidity" && placeTag == $req.getPlaceTag())
  not Event(dataType == "comfortability" && ($time.getTime() - created.getTime()) <  3 * 1000)
then
  eventStore.insert(new Event("event", "comfortability", $req.getPlaceTag(), null, null,((Double.valueOf($temp.getValue().toString()) * 0.81)+(0.01 * Double.valueOf($humid.getValue().toString())*((0.99 * Double.valueOf($temp.getValue().toString()))-14.3)+46))));
end
rule "riskofcovid19"
when
  $time: TimerEvent()
  $req:Event(deviceId.contains("request:risk") && ( $time.getTime() - created.getTime()) <  10*1000)
  $temp:Event(dataType == "temperature" && placeTag == $req.getPlaceTag()) 
  $humid:Event(dataType == "humidity" && placeTag == $req.getPlaceTag())
  not Event(dataType == "risk" && ($time.getTime()-created.getTime()) <  3 * 1000)
then
  double t = Double.valueOf($temp.getValue().toString());
  double RH = Double.valueOf($humid.getValue().toString());
  eventStore.insert(new Event("event", "risk", $req.getPlaceTag(), null, null,217*(6.1078*Math.pow(10,(7.5*t/(t+237.3)))/(t+273.15)*RH/100)));
end

rule "kandansa"
when
  $time: TimerEvent()
  $req:Event(deviceId.contains("request:difference") && ($time.getTime()-created.getTime()) <  10 * 1000)
  $temp1:Event(dataType == "temperature" && placeTag == $req.getPlaceTag())
  $temp2:Event(dataType == "temperature" && placeTag == "outside")
  not Event(dataType == "difference" && ($time.getTime()-created.getTime()) <  3 * 1000)
then
  System.out.printf("[timer] timer:%d%n", $time.getTime());
  eventStore.insert(new Event("event", "difference", $req.getPlaceTag(), null, null,Math.abs(Double.valueOf($temp1.getValue().toString())-Double.valueOf($temp2.getValue().toString()))));
end
